content: the **cozy crochet cottage hat** is made with cottagespun chunky yarn and a 6 mm hook featuring a stretchy ribbed edge and simple stitches like single_crochet half_double_crochet and double_crochet this pattern is a breeze to make includes sizes from newborn to adult large matching scarf pattern also available **join the cal newsletter here ** https //oombawkadesigncrochet ck page/0fde95d68d this is just one of the patterns included in our hat of the month club collection > this pattern will be available as a > free pdf download until january 27 > 2025 at 11 59 pm est new york time > 23 59 for cal participants simply > add the pattern to your cart before > 11 59 pm est on january 27 and it > will show as $0 00 the free pattern will be available on my blog beginning on january 26 2025 at 9 00 pm est new york time 21 00 you can find the matching scarf pattern here https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/warm-and-cozy-crochet-cottage-scarf-pattern/ 1 > this pattern is available for free on > my website which is monetized by ads > if you prefer an ad-free version of > the pattern it is available to > purchase from my pattern shop ♥ rhondda instagram https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ pinterest https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ youtube https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet facebook https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter © 2012-2025 designed by rhondda mol oombawka design crochet all rights reserved you may sell finished items you crochet from this pattern no part of this publication may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from rhondda mol 1 https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/warm-and-cozy-crochet-cottage-scarf-pattern/
